MergeConfigurationImpl - Class in com.graphql_java_generator.mavenplugin
 
MergeMojo - Class in com.graphql_java_generator.mavenplugin
The merge goal generates GraphQL schema, based on the source GraphQL schemas.
It can be used to: Merge several GraphQL schema files into one file, for instance with additional schema files that would use the extend GraphQL keyword Reformat the schema file
